activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#8051
activity.text: @gayann-au it is not easily possible to distinctively differentiate between a landline and a mobile number. So instead we've decided to add an info icon to convey what the icons try to convey. (i.e., the icons represent which numbers are allowed in this field and rather not about which type of number the currently entered one is).

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#8040
activity.text:
@aparnacoronasafe 

> The aspect ratio has changed.

The aspect ratio has not been changed. It uses 16:9 standard video ratio before and now. Could you provide screenshots / more details for it?

> Is it possible that the new component is slower and requires a better internet speed to work.

The new component does not require any extra internet speed to work. It uses the same method as before to stream the video. 

The new component would attempt to reconnect if the latency goes beyond 5 seconds and would cause a momentary black screen until reconnected. Should we consider increasing the latency threshold?

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#8051
activity.text:
@gayann-au The purpose of the mobile/landline/support(toll-free) number icons are for indicating which type of number are ALLOWED in that particular field, and not which is the current type based on the input. 

Certain phone number fields in CARE do not accept landline numbers and certain fields do accept support / toll-free numbers in addition to mobile and landline numbers. Icons are to indicate those.

open_prs.title: Refactor rendering of array of strings to utilise `humanizeStrings` utility method
Phone number field: Adds helper icon to improve how supported phone number types are shown
Add caution for encounter date field if date is beyond 30 days.
Shows encounter duration in discharge confirmation dialog
Improvements to fullscreen support in Camera Feed
Allows creation of duplicate symptoms if cure date is present
Progress Notes: Adds support for filing Resp. support and Neurological Monitoring data
Disallow read only users from performing writes to asset
remove deprecated fields that has been migrated to new models (Diagnosis and Prescriptions)
Prescriptions and MAR: Disallow users to perform edits on discharged encounters
